verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> fellow <S%G1294>perverting<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2967>forbidding<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5411>tribute<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that he <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> a <S%G935>King.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3004>sayest<s%> it.

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G158>fault<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> were the more <S%G2001>fierce,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> He stirreth <S%G383>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G2596>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2449>Jewry,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> this <S%G5602>place.<s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2076>were<s%> a <S%G1057>Galilaean.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as soon as he <S%G1921>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he belonged <S%G2076>unto<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> <S%G1849>jurisdiction,<s%> he <S%G375>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> who <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5025>that<s%> <S%G2250>time.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he was exceeding <S%G5463>glad:<s%> <S%G3029><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2309>desirous<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2425>long<s%> season, because he had <S%G191>heard<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1679>hoped<s%> to have <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4592>miracle<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1905>questioned<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3056>words;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> and <S%G2159>vehemently<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> men of <S%G4753>war<s%> set him at <S%G1848>naught,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, and <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in a <S%G2986>gorgeous<s%> <S%G2066>robe,<s%> and sent him <S%G375>again<s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G3326>together:<s%> <S%G240><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4391>before<s%> they <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G4314>between<s%> <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> when he had called <S%G4779>together<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> Ye have <S%G4374>brought<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one that <S%G654>perverteth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people:<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I,<s%> having <S%G350>examined<s%> him <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G158>fault<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> touching those things <S%G3739>whereof<s%> ye <S%G2723>accuse<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

No, <S%G235><s%> nor <S%G3761>yet<s%> <S%G2264>Herod:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G375>sent<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2400>lo,<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4238>done<s%> unto <S%G846>him.<s%>
I will <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>chastise<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G630>release<s%> him.
(For <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G318>necessity<s%> he <S%G2192>must<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> the <S%G1859>feast.)<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they cried <S%G349>out<s%> all at <S%G3826>once,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G142>Away<s%> with <S%G5126>this<s%> man, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> Barabbas: <S%G912><s%>

(Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4714>sedition<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for <S%G5408>murder,<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison.)<s%>
Pilate <S%G4091><s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> spake again to <S%G4377>them.<s%> <S%G3825><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2019>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> him, <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the third <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G1063>Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> hath <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G4160>done?<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G158>cause<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> I will <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3811>chastise<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let him <S%G630>go.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> were <S%G1945>instant<s%> with <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G154>requiring<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> might be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2729>prevailed.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> gave <S%G1948>sentence<s%> that it should <S%G1096>be<s%> as they <S%G846>required.<s%> <S%G155><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G630>released<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> him that <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4714>sedition<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5408>murder<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they had <S%G154>desired;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2307>will.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they led him <S%G520>away,<s%> <S%G846><s%> they laid hold <S%G1949>upon<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> a <S%G2956>Cyrenian,<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G68>country,<s%> and on <S%G846>him<s%> they <S%G2007>laid<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross,<s%> that he might <S%G5342>bear<s%> it <S%G3693>after<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turning<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Daughters <S%G2364><s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G4133>but<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> children. <S%G5043><s%>

For, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> are <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> they shall <S%G2046>say,<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4723>barren,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2836>wombs<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G1080>bare,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3149>paps<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> gave suck. <S%G2337><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall they <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> <S%G4098>Fall<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2248>us;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1015>hills,<s%> <S%G2572>Cover<s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G5200>green<s%> <S%G3586>tree,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> dry? <S%G3584><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2087>other,<s%> <S%G2557>malefactors,<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be put to <S%G337>death.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they were <S%G565>come<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> which is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2898>Calvary,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2557>malefactors,<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G3739>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G710>left.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> they do. <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G1266>parted<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>raiment,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2334>beholding.<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1592>derided<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> let him <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> coming <S%G4334>to<s%> him, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4374>offering<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>be<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>thyself.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> a <S%G1923>superscription<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in <S%G1121>letters<s%> of <S%G1673>Greek,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4513>Latin,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1444>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G3778>THIS<s%> <S%G2076>IS<s%> <S%G3588>THE<s%> <S%G935>KING<s%> OF <S%G3588>THE<s%> <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2557>malefactors<s%> which were <S%G2910>hanged<s%> railed <S%G987>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>be<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Dost <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>seeing<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G1346>justly;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G618>receive<s%> the due <S%G514>reward<s%> of our <S%G3739>deeds:<s%> <S%G4238><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> hath <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G824>amiss.<s%>
